resources.string: No Plans were found. Please Add a Custom Plan from the Main Menu.
The Exercise Name Cannot be Empty.
Are you sure you want to clear the current data?
Use the Add Button (+) in the Toolbar above to Create new Workouts.
Are you sure you want to delete the workout on : %1$s.
Welcome to The Gym Notebook. This app will keep track of all your exercises which you have completed using an intuitive interface.
The code for this application can be found on the github page https://github.com/Thermolink/The-Gym-Notebook
It would be greatly appreciated if you could provide feedback for this application. If you wish to support this application, you can contribute directly on the github page!
If you have any questions, please ask them on the github page, or email them to mike@thermodev.com
